name: Loki Hammer mk iii
description:
New Loki hammer mk iii

Any orders placed this December for this guitar will be 40% off! That's right, £360 for a stunning new axe.

Options include:
Body wood - basswood, mahogany or alder

Fretboard - Ebony, Zebrawood or flame maple

Neck - 1piece flame maple, 3 piece flame maple, or 5 piece flame maple and ebony

Top - Flame maple, quilted maple, spalted maple or body wood

Binding - pearloid, white, black or alabone.

Hardware colour - chrome, black or gold

Finish - Any solid/transparent/burst/satin finish, natural gloss/satin.



Fixed spec:

26" scale length
24 frets
5 way blade switch
Loki *new* 'Molten Core' pickups
T-o-m bridge
Locking tuners
1 volume
Body,neck & headstock shape

All guitars come with a Loki gigbag. 

Postage not included in discount. European and USA shipping available at buyers expense. Expected order time 9-12 weeks.

name: Relic
description:
Give your guitar a vintage feel with our relic'ing service. This will make your guitar look as if it just arrived from the 1950's, but now plays even better.

This service includes a complete setup and re-string for all instruments, and is available on anything with strings.

We offer 3 stages, light, medium and heavy.

Light - Minor in appearance, but great on the hands, softening the edges of frets, and wearing the lacquer down to give a slightly worn appearance with a few chips and dings for good measure.

Medium - Surface scratches and body work cuts, exposing the under layers and wood surface, but rounding off any grooves to give a "worn over time" look. This also increases speed of the neck by creating a satin finish, and enhancing the hardware with some small details.

Heavy - For only the most daring, this will really take your guitar back a few decades. This includes everything we can do; scratching, wearing, erosion of paint and edge softening, neck grading, fret rounding, acid erosion of hardware, plectrum scratches, buckle rash and anything else you might want.

All these options are available direct from Loki Guitars, and can be pre-arranged with specific attention to certain areas, so you know the outcome before we even begin.

For the cheapest price, you can contact us directly, and arrange an instrument collection/postage to and from the shop.

name: Loki Hammer 'Mod'
description:
Loki Hammer Custom 6

Based on the standard hammer model
Options include:

Scale Length - 25.5/26".

Body Wood - Mahogany, Elm, Ash, Korina.
Wood Veneer top - Spalted, Flame, Quilt or Birdseye Maple.
Neck Wood - Mahogany, Maple, Figured Maple.
Fretboard Wood - Ebony, Flame Maple, Birdseye Maple, Rosewood.
Binding - None, Black, White, Cream.

Pickups - Single Humbucker, Dual humbucker, 3 Singles.
Pickup Covers - Covered/Uncovered.

Bridge - Loki* Fixed, Standard Trem, Loki* Licensed Floyd Rose

Electronics - Volume/Tone/3way, Volume/3way.

Hardware - Chrome, Gold, Black.

(Upgraded pickups available on request +£80 for single or £125 for matching set)
Bare Knuckle Pickups, Lace, Artec, Schaller.

(Paint and burst finishes included in price, detail in order form)

name: Hammer 7
description:
Specification:
7 Strings,
26.5" Scale length,
24 Jumbo Frets,
Neck Through body Design.

Timber:
Ash Body, Spalted Maple Top and Matching Headstock Cap,
5 Piece Maple/Ebony Neck Through Design,
Ebony Fretboard.

Hardware:
LoKI Hardtail Bridge - string through body,
Locking Tuners,
Black Chrome Finish.

Electronics:
LoKI H series Pickups, High output voicing, geared for heavy tone with tight low ends and a punchy midrange, with clear but smooth highs,
1 Volume, 1 Tone, 3 way mini toggle switch.

Available from January 2013
